name: supabase
description: Supabase is an open-source Firebase alternative providing Postgres, authentication, storage, and real-time APIs. It can be self-hosted or used as a fully managed cloud service.

features.title: Postgresql Database
features.description: Provides full-featured Postgres with extensions and custom functions

features.title: User Management
features.description: Built-in user management with email, OAuth, and magic link support

features.title: REST API
features.description: Manages file uploads with access control and CDN integration

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Implements fine-grained access control using Postgres policies

features.title: Database Migrations
features.description: Manages schema changes with version-controlled migrations
